question: Which one of the following best defines the term ‘State’?
option_a:
A community of persons permanently occupying a definite territory independent of
external control and possessing an organized government
option_b:
A politically organized people of a definite territory and possessing an authority to
govern them, maintain law and order, protect their natural rights and safeguard their
means of sustenance
option_c:
A number of persons who have been living in a definite territory for a very long time
with their own culture, tradition and government
option_d:
A society permanently living in a definite territory with a central authority, an executive
responsible to the central authority and an independent judiciary
